reviewText: Although this is a difficult movie to watch if you have someone with special needs in your family, the film deals with many realistic, heart-wrenching topics very accurately.  The writing is superb, the acting is spectacular and the cinematography is outstanding.  This film deserves to win awards.
I found this movie to be dark and unhappy. I did not like this movie at all.  The acting is good.
Interesting film with solid acting and writing.
